title: Buying RP points from a foreigner server
body: Hi, I live in south america but play on the NA server so I can play with friends. I'm really interested in buying some skins but I'm not sure since the payment appears only in dollars (even when i put my country in payment options). It's only possible to buy RP for a NA account with an international credit card? Thanks in advance!

replies.body:
A number of players that play on the NA Server from countries outside of the US & Canada have found luck in using Paypal when making RP purchases. I recommend giving it a go to see if it works for you too! :)

Let me know if you have any questions about this.
